body_html: I'm not sure if mod in models is well-defined enough to know what the gradient should be in all cases. The angle case makes sense, but lots of uses of mod (binning, etc) are inherently discontinuous, certainly with integers. @girving, do you think we should provide a default mod gradient, or just let people override them appropriately for their application when they see this error?
